nl.renarj.jasdb.api.metadata

Interface Instance

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DBInstance
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBInstanceImpl, InstanceMeta, InstanceRest

    public interface Instance
    This represents an Instance in Jasdb, every JasDB can have multiple instances. Each instance is a unit which can contain bags which can have indexes and stored data entities.
    Author:
    Renze de Vries

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getInstanceId()
      Gets the identifier of this instance
      String getPath()
      The storage path used for this instance
